modName: Blade and Soul Force Bangle HDT
summary: two Force Master weapons with HDT aura
descriptionHtml:
adds two force bangle from Blade & Soul with HDT aura.

I know auras doesn't looks awesome like Blade & Soul, it's cause of Skyrim's physics limitations.

requires HDT plugin and SKSE. without them aura won't move properly.



craftable with a gold ingot and diamond.

or can get them via console, search codes with 

help "force bangle" 4

and player.additem code 1 


Force bangles will be treated as expensive ring, and can be enchanted.






++++


may cause FPS down while worn. Of course!

normally HDT mods consumes FPS much more than you think in LOW END PC
author: goldiocks
